title: Appeltaart (Dutch apple tart)
ingredients: ['For the pastry', '250g plain flour', '175g butter, softened', '80g caster sugar', '2 eggs (1½ for the pastry mixture, ½ for brushing the top)', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', 'For the filling', '1 kg apples (tart, bit sour)', '50g caster sugar', '70g sultanas', '3 teaspoons ground cinnamon']
